announcementList: Welcome to Sugoi Toolkit V2.5, in this version any announcement can be posted here. I'll cross post between discord and this window
Sugoi model V4.0, our best model, is now available on Patreon, https://www.patreon.com/mingshiba
Hey you, aren't you excited by Christmas? I may have a special present for you then. Keep an eye on the announcement window or on discord
